AI_QUICK_TEMPER.NAME: Quick Temper
AI_QUICK_TEMPER.DESC: Whenever [ENEMY] shuffles their deck, Deploy [S] Irked.

AI_RIFLED_POCKETS.NAME: Rifled Pockets
AI_RIFLED_POCKETS.DESC: Unplayable. When drawn, copy [N] card(s) from [ENEMY]'s hand and add them to your hand, then Scour this.

AI_RITES.NAME: Rites
AI_RITES.DESC: Deal [D] damage. Deals bonus damage equal to the number of your Talisman arguments (currently [N]).

DECKARD_ADAPTIVE.NAME: Adaptive
DECKARD_ADAPTIVE.DESC: Whenever the Ambience phase changes, apply [S] Poise to all your arguments.

DECKARD_ADDENDUM.NAME: Addendum
DECKARD_ADDENDUM.DESC: When drawn, deal [D] damage to a random enemy argument and Deploy [S] Finesse.

DECKARD_BARREL_THROUGH.NAME: Barrel Through
DECKARD_BARREL_THROUGH.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Deals bonus damage equal to half your Poise.

DECKARD_BREAKTHROUGH.NAME: Breakthrough
DECKARD_BREAKTHROUGH.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Whenever the Ambience phase changes towards Guarded, this card costs 0 until your next turn.

DECKARD_BRASH.NAME: Brash
DECKARD_BRASH.DESC: Deal [D] damage to all enemy arguments.

DECKARD_BULLDOZE.NAME: Bulldoze
DECKARD_BULLDOZE.DESC: Whenever an enemy argument is destroyed, draw [S] card(s) and gain [S] action(s).

DECKARD_CALM.NAME: Calm
DECKARD_CALM.DESC:
Apply [P] Poise to all your arguments.
Double your Poise.

DECKARD_CHALLENGE.NAME: Challenge
DECKARD_CHALLENGE.DESC: Remove all Poise from your core argument to deal damage equal to Poise removed.

DECKARD_CURVEBALL.NAME: Curveball
DECKARD_CURVEBALL.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Deal Piercing damage if the last card played this turn was a Dialogue card.
Draw [N] cards if the last card played this turn was an Influence card.

DECKARD_FLATTER.NAME: Flatter
DECKARD_FLATTER.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
If you have no Aggression cards in hand, this costs 0 and hits ALL enemy arguments.

DECKARD_FOLLOW_UP.NAME: Follow Up
DECKARD_FOLLOW_UP.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Whenever the Ambience phase changes, return this card from your discard pile to your hand.

DECKARD_GOOD_IMPRESSION.NAME: Good Impression
DECKARD_GOOD_IMPRESSION.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Increase the cost of this card by 1 for the rest of negotiation.

DECKARD_GUARDED_RESPONSE.NAME: Guarded Response
DECKARD_GUARDED_RESPONSE.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Apply Poise to all your arguments equal to damage dealt by this card.

DECKARD_HOTHEADED.NAME: Hotheaded
DECKARD_HOTHEADED.DESC: Whenever the Ambience phase changes towards Dangerous, draw [S] cards.

DECKARD_INSTINCTS.NAME: Instincts
DECKARD_INSTINCTS.DESC: Choose: Deploy [STACKS] Finesse, or Deploy [STACKS] Heated.

DECKARD_JABBER.NAME: Jabber
DECKARD_JABBER.DESC:
Deal [D] damage.
Apply [P] Poise to your core argument.

DECKARD_REVERSAL.NAME: Reversal
DECKARD_REVERSAL.DESC: Remove all Poise from target enemy argument and apply it to your core argument.

DECKARD_RUMINATE.NAME: Ruminate
DECKARD_RUMINATE.DESC: Choose a card in hand. Give it Preserve.

DECKARD_SNIPING_REMARK.NAME: Sniping Remark
DECKARD_SNIPING_REMARK.DESC:
Remove all Poise from target argument.
Deal [D] damage.

DECKARD_STAY_COOL.NAME: Stay Cool
DECKARD_STAY_COOL.DESC: At the start of your turn, apply [S] Poise to your core argument.

DECKARD_TRASH_TALK.NAME: Trash Talk
DECKARD_TRASH_TALK.DESC: Deal [D] damage to a random enemy argument [ITERATIONS] times.

ESPHER_JUXTAPOSITION.NAME: Juxtaposition
ESPHER_JUXTAPOSITION.DESC: Refresh the use of your partner ability this negotiation. Scour.
